Former Ecuador VP Glas to appeal judge's order to return to jailEcuadorean former Vice President Jorge Glas will appeal a decision by a judge ordering him back to prison, his lawyer said on Thursday, saying that a return to jail would be dangerous. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 00:38:04 GMT AHL67UQUGVLT7HVQT7SUGENLFU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/former-ecuador-vp-glass-appeal-judges-order-return-to-jail-2023-12-29/Reuters世界美洲
Ukraine government donor letter no grounds for panic, says UkrinformA letter from Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal requesting an emergency meeting with international donors and seen by Bloomberg news agency was part of "systemic work" with the country's partners, the state-run Ukrinform news agency quoted a senior source as saying late on Thursday. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 00:26:36 GMT 7COHOAPN2NNEFOZ4PEBMMXGDU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-government-donor-letter-no-grounds-panic-says-ukraine-form-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli tanks, missiles strike Gaza in offensive against HamasIsraeli forces attacked areas of the central and southern Gaza Strip where residents have been expecting a renewed ground offensive in areas crammed with tens of thousands of Palestinians already displaced by the Israeli-Hamas war. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 22:50:18 GMT Y564UT4TLVK7JLHZCOGXU6FLUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-tanks-missiles-strike-gaza-offective-against-hamas-2023-12-28/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud世界中东地区
Israel hits air defence base in Syria -intel sourcesIsrael carried out an aerial strike targeting a main Syrian air defence base in southern Syria on Thursday in the latest bombing campaign since the outbreak of war in Gaza on Oct. 7, Syrian army and intelligence sources said. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 22:39:35 GMT QQ5WATER25NANFHZMNRQ2EN2LA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-hits-syrian-air-defence-base-southern-syria-intel-sources-2023-12-28/Suleiman Al-Khalidi世界中东地区
Ukraine official says drone debris hits Odesa high-rise buildingA fire broke out at a multi-story building in the Black Sea port city of Odesa late on Thursday after drones were reported to be headed for the area, authorities said. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 22:15:58 GMT OOAK5KK6VZNLNJTQTDOLGWVR5A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-official-says-drone-debris-hits-odessa-high-rise-building-2023-12-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Former Hong Kong independence group leader seeks asylum in BritainThe former leader of a Hong Kong pro-independence group, who was sentenced in 2021 to prison under a national security law imposed by China, said on Thursday he had fled to Britain and formally applied for political asylum. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 22:11:15 GMT EFQJSGSLGFLLRFXMOY3JQWOWKI https://www.reuters.com/world/former-hong-kong-independence-group-leader-seeks-asylum-in-UK-2023-12-28/Kanishka Singh世界
Ukraine gives more details of latest alleged killing of POWsRussia has yet to comment on the allegation, the second accusation that it has killed prisoners of war leveled against it this month by Ukrainian prosecutors. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 21:03:24 GMT AVKQIHKBBBIYTCGY3X2PMVDOUGHT https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-gives-more-details-latest-alleged-killing-pows-2023-12-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy says he discussed peace formula with PopeUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said he discussed Ukraine's peace formula in a call with Pope Francis on Thursday. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 21:01:53 GMT S76S5WA7JFIVPHVO6RZIOBL7RA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-zelenskiy-says-he-discussed-peace-formula-with-pope-2023-12-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli troops killed hostages, mistaking their cries for help as ambush -militaryIsraeli troops killed three Israeli hostages in Gaza on Dec. 15 when it mistook their cries for help as a ruse by Hamas militants to draw them into an ambush, the military said on Thursday, concluding that the soldiers acted rightly to the best of their understanding. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 20:29:11 GMT CMDG5CIDEZLDBLT7WYVJRRHBWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-troops-killed-hostages-mistake-their-cries-help-ambush-military-2023-12-28/Emily Rose世界中东地区
Biden says American Judith Weinstein was killed by Hamas on Oct. 7American Judith Weinstein, who was believed to have been kidnapped by Hamas, was killed by the Palestinian Islamist group on Oct. 7 when it attacked Israel, President Joe Biden said on Thursday, adding he was devastated by the news. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 20:19:04 GMT BRIEPRFM35IQTBFCQS2CRWZBF4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/biden-says-american-judith-weinstein-was-killed-by-hamas-oct-7-2023-12-28/Andrea Shalal, Kanishka Singh世界中东地区
France, Germany, UK and US condemn Iran's increase in uranium enrichmentFrance, Germany, Britain and the United States on Thursday condemned an increase by Iran in the production rate of highly enriched uranium of up to 60% purity, close to the level used for nuclear weapons fuel. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 19:34:28 GMT 5XYTOCOMZBN73N5FVGR77RTNW4 https://www.reuters.com/world/france-germany-uk-us-condemn-iran-increase-uranium-enrichment-2023-12-28/Jonathan Landay世界
